summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of L.I.D. No. 6660 for the improvement of S. Holly St. from 33rd Ave. S. to 38th Ave. S.; and certain other streets and avenues; by construction watermains together with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtenances. Also, S. Graham St. at approx. 5 feet east of 33rd Ave. S.; by installing a fire hydrant; under Ord. No. 104822, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
